Title: Antoine and Antoinette
Writer: Jacques Becker (scenario and dialogue), Maurice Griffe (scenario and dialogue), Françoise Giroud (scenario and dialogue)
Actors: Roger Pigaut, Claire Mafféi, Noël Roquevert, Gaston Modot
Plot: Working class couple Antoine and Antoinette dream of a better life. In the midst of constantly fending off the unwanted attention of men, especially the grocer Monsieur Roland, Antoinette purchases a winning lottery ticket. But when Antoine loses their ticket out of poverty, their dreams seem like they'll remain just that.
